body.name: 2K Indoor Security Camera, Litokam 360° Cameras for Home Security Indoor with Motion Detection, Pet Camera with Phone App, Baby Monitor-Night Vision
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 44 mins
features: 📷【2K HD & Smart Pan/Tilt Indoor Camera】Litokam indoor security camera equipped with 2K resolution and high-tech optic lens presents sharper details and produces crystal clear image quality. Support 2.4GHz Wi-Fi wireless connectivity (Not compatible with 5GHz), the indoor camera provides a wider viewing angle with horizontal 360° and vertical 110° function for complete coverage of your home, no blind spot

🔔【Motion Detection & Auto Movement Tracking】The cameras for home security indoor adopts Smart Perceive Technology to detect movements. Your phone will get an alert notification to push in time once motion is detected. Just open the APP to have a quick check on what happened, you won't miss any important movements! The Motion Detection sensibility can be adjusted by yourself. Meanwhile, when you turn on the function of auto movement tracking, the home camera will move as the object moves

📞【Fluent 2 Way Audio & Manually Night Vision】Little elf camera built-in microphone and speaker, you can keep in touch with your baby/pet/nanny anywhere, anytime between the Little elf Smart APP. With the intelligent IR-Cut switch, the indoor camera wireless will automatically change into day/night mode according to light changes. You can also manually turn it on or off as you like, the night vision distance is up to 33 feet in the pitch dark

☁【Double Storage & Encrypted Local Record】You can save videos to a max 128GB TF card ( Not included ) or cloud storage (14 days free trial) to make sure you can playback the video records at any time. High level encryption technology will protect your videos can be only read by you even if this home cameras indoor is stolen or broken, no one can access your recording videos

💌【Multi-Users & Multiple View】This pet camera with phone app supports many users (No limit on the number of accounts) to view simultaneously on iPhone and Android phone. You could share your security camera with friends and family for good moments. Little elf Smart app can manage multiple cameras for home security and display 16 live videos on one screen, helping you keep up with everything in your house. Please feel free to contact us if you have any problems

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera system for the money!
reviews.reviewText: The Litokam security cameras are great. I bought them for watching my elderly parent, who has been falling. I can now easily walk away from him or do some work and watch him on my phone. The app is easy and straight forward. The only tricky thing was connecting the cameras for the first time. You only need to be a 3-5 inches away from the phone when linking it.Picture quality is great. You can zoom in and zoom out. Night vision is pretty good. Sound for hearing is amazing. Motion detection is good too. Sound to talk and communicate through the camera from phone is ok.Also, using in the bathroom was difficult at first. I could not see the angles I need to see, so using the wall/ceiling attachment was pretty easy. Drill 2 holes the right size, put in the anchor and screw in to the wall. Gave me a great angle. Since it is upside down, you have to go into the setting for the camera-basic function settings- flip screen.Highly recommend, I will be adding 2 more cameras to the system.Cheers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product! VERY impressed!
reviews.reviewText: The connection took less than 5 minutes. Simple & easy!!! The camera itself is a good size, nice quality. The mic both ways it good. Picture quality is stellar! For the price this product is AMAZING. I get motion detection notifications. Overall 100 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this camera as room cams for my kids and cat and it works amazingly! It's very easy to set up and the images are very clear even at night. It has a lot of features and the built is excellent. The microphone is very good quality, I am able to talk to my kids and they can hear my voice very well. I also like that it allows for a wide range of viewing and detects the movement from my kids and cat very quickly. I don't regret buying and will purchase more in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price
reviews.reviewText: The picture clarity and night vision quality were better than I expected. It was easy to set up and use the app. I like the overall look and versatility of the cameras. I was able to use the app with reasonable ease from home and away. That being said, I thought the motion following aspect was not as good as I would've liked. There was too much lag and it wouldn't follow or detect a fast moving object. Setting the cameras up for the patrol mode was a little touchy and I had to reset the "site" points a couple of times to get it where I liked. Overall I'm very satisfied so far (I've only had the system up and running for a couple days). I wasn't expecting much considering the price but this exceeded my expectations. If the cameras didn't have the lag time (a couple seconds) and followed motion detection a little better, I would definitely give this 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This little camera does everything very well at a ateal of a price
reviews.reviewText: The value of what this camera offers to cost ratio is simply a fantastic choice. Great recording quality, easy interface and easy to set up, but the only gripe I have is the provided USB cable is a little too short

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera, easy set up, well designed app
reviews.reviewText: We bought two of these to watch our pets while we were at work. The camera tracks any motion and sends us a notification when there is movement. The app is super easy to set up and allows you to access your video feed 24/7 from anywhere. The talk feature is also really great because we can talk to our pets throughout the day. If you choose to purchase their cloud save, you can save and view videos at any time. This is very helpful for us because we’ve had a couple incidents where our pets have gotten into trouble. The automatic night vision system is super helpful because we don’t have to change it once we turn lights off. Highly recommend these cameras.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear picture. Security for Your Peace of Mind
reviews.reviewText: If you need good home monitoring this is a good option. Nice small size. Sturdy camera with solid base. Clear picture. Easy setup. Great Seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This camera was affordable and is the perfect size for a home camera. The quality of video is amazing and the camera has is able to rotate to film 360 degrees! You can also move the camera around while watching it live on your phone. You can manually adjust it to film all angles or you can do it via your phone.However, there is a small slot to place a micro sd card. If you choose to place the micro sd to save video recording you will not be able to move the camera 360 degrees due to the card sticking out. To avoid that you can pay for their service which I am not too sure how much it is a month but I believe it records 24/7.Overall it’s a great camera, not super efficient with the as card slot. I still use it so I it was worth it to me.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great value. Great way to keep an eye on the cat while we are out.
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased with the 2 pet cameras. The order came very quickly. I had my husband set it up. Both cameras should be plugged in while you do the set up. It did come with brief setup instructions.I had bought a similar pet camera a month ago from another seller ( to keep an eye out for the wild cat outside we are feeding ) but it was now much more expensive, so I decided to try this seller which had a better price point.I liked that the cameras I choose are black as they blend in better with our darker furniture. The camera picture is very clear both in colour during the daytime and black in white for night vision.It does have the option, and comes with a base to mount it on the ceiling or on the wall ( white colour is also available ) but we just have it on a side table and on the counter as our preference.The motion detector works well. It will take a picture and send it to you when there is any motion. You can set the sensitivities. It does let you know when there is movement.You also have the option to watch live feed.I did not get any extra subscriptions. It is just perfect for what we need. I do recommend this product to others. Good for keeping an eye on the pets, baby or house.

Wir benutzen die Kamera als Babyphone und sind mehr als zufrieden. Wir hatten vorher ein Babyphone mit Monitor (dieses hatte fünfmal soviel gekostet). Super Bild und Tonqualität. Wir hatten vorher das Problem das der Empfang nicht bis in den Garten gereicht hat, mit dieser Kamera überhaupt kein Problem da sie über Wlan läuft. Umso besser finden wir auch das die Kamera zum Datenschutz ausgeschalten werden kann wenn sie nicht benötigt wird, das gibt uns eine gewisse Sicherheit. Klasse finden wir auch die Möglichkeit der Bild und Videoaufnahmen so können wir auch schöne Erinnerungen sammeln 🤩Durch die drehbare Kamera können wir das ganze Zimmer im Blick behalten was vorher leider auch nicht ganz so möglich (war trotz drehbarerer Kamera). Klasse finden wir auch die Bewegungsverfolgung so sehen wir unseren kleinen jederzeit. Die Appbedienung ist super einfach und auch die Installation ist in 2 Minuten erledigt.Auf dem Bild ist der Nachtsichtmodus zu sehen und auch hier sind wir von der Bildqualität begeistert.Wir würden sie immer wieder kaufen, wenn sie jetzt noch langlebig ist, ist alles perfekt 👌Preisleistung top 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Very easy and quick to set up, clear and smooth panning
reviews.reviewText: These litocam cameras do a lot more than I expected. I could access the camera through an app anywhere in the world with internet access and also supports audio so you can listen and eavesdrop on your kids. You can also press to talk to them if you need to. The scrolling and panning is very smooth as well as the streaming quality, definitely highly recommended. These cameras only takes a few seconds to boot up and connect to your Wi-Fi. Will be adding more to my home. Ideal for keeping an eye anywhere. You can also set up alerts for movement on the camera and your mobile phone app. The only downside is the volume can be quite loud on the camera when communicating thru the intercom.
Bildqualität und Funktionen sind trotz des niedrigen Preises sehr gut.Sogar in der Nacht lässt sich alles deutlich erkennen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: These Are Great Little Indoor Security Cameras !
reviews.reviewText: I've had & been using these little Litokam indoor home security cameras for several months now & they have been great ! I downloaded the little elf security camera app to use them with & this has also worked great without any issues ! You can choose & use a good selection of features within the app for the cameras like, motion detection, motion detection alarm, so you receive messages alerts to your phone or tablet. You can also choose the sensitivity, low, medium or high. You can also turn on motion tracking so the camera will follow the subject & it's movement. You also have sound detection, where if it picks up unusual sounds, you will receive an alert. You can also choose human detection where it will only react to human forms & their movements, instead of picking up any & all other movements. You can also set schedules to. They also have night vision, which is a great feature to have when the lights are out. Plus it's great that you have the option of inserting a micro SD card to record your footage on. You can also choose to have & pay monthly or yearly subscription for a storage cloud within the app for the cameras if this is a better option for you as well. Also within the app, you are able to turn the cameras of your choice off using private mode if you don't want them on & recording continuously or you want some privacy. They are also really handy if like me you have any pets as well. It gives you peace of mind knowing if you have to pop out & about & go anywhere, that you are able to check on them & make sure they are all safe & sound. This Is one of the main reasons I decided to purchased them. They come with everything you need, so they are ready to set up & go straight out of the box & once connected to the little elf camera app. They are great little home security cameras & they've worked perfectly for me.
